page.title: 07THE RIPPERIDGE INN
page.content: The{Ripperidge Inn}stands on a rise.It is a large,white and cream building. Through the door you can see a reception hall with seats and plants. This leads to the two restaurants.The two restaurants are the a la Carte with silver service and the Chef's pantry. The Ripperidge has ten full-time staff and ten part time.There are two restaurants and two bars and one big kitchen.They cater for 15 to 20 wedding receptions a year.This is not many because the bars are open to the public in the evenings.There are no residents. The a la Carte restaurant seats 70 people,but on Saturday they may serve over 140 people. There is{parking}for about 100 cars. It is owned by a Stourport building company. Children are allowed but there are no facilities for them.
